text: The Theatre Surjya () is a New mobile theatre group of the North-Eastern Indian state of Assam, founded by Munindra Barman in 2015. It was launched in a big way in 2015-16 season. The main actors which were signed for the 2015-16 season are Tapan Das, Chinmoy Kotoky, Rajkumar, Devismita and Bhranti Medhi.
